text: may refer to: ==Places== * Miyajima, another name for the Japanese island Itsukushima * Miyajima, Hiroshima, a former town on this island, merged into Hatsukaichi, Hiroshima in 2005 * Itsukushima Shrine, a Shinto shrine on the island of Itsukushima, often referred to as "Miyajima"
title: Miyajima
